actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that benefits computed under the special minimum primary insurance amount formula shall be periodically increased, in the same manner as other benefits payable under such title are increased, to take account of rises in the cost of living.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Social Security Act to provide that, under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program, the special minimum primary insurance amount benefits shall be increased periodically to take account of increases in the cost of living.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that benefits computed under the special minimum primary insurance amount formula shall be periodically increased, in the same manner as other benefits payable under such title are increased, to take account of rises in the cost of living.
